directions.step:
Peel pears, leaving them whole with stem intact. Place in slow cooker. Add apple juice, vanilla, butter and cinnamon stick. Cook on high for 3-4 hours.
Remove pears with slotted spoon. Place in individual dessert dishes. Heat apricot preserves in small saucepan until melted. Top each pear with preserves sauce. Serve 6 Source: Home Cooking Typed in MMFormat by cjhartlin@msn.com 01/02/98 Posted to MM-Recipes Digest V5 #027 by "Cindy Hartlin" <cjhartlin@email.msn.com> on Jan 26, 1998
